## PBScope.$getVertexAttrib() method

Get the input vertex attribute by specified semantic

**Signature:**

```typescript
$getVertexAttrib(semantic: VertexSemantic): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

semantic

</td><td>

The vertex semantic


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The input vertex attribute or null if not exists

## Remarks

Can only be called only in vertex shader
